pageContext.description: Dimensions: L 163mm; Wbl 36.4mm; W at loops 23.5mm; Wm 20.8mm; Ds >57; B lp plates 6.2 & 7.0; Wt. 97.9 g (includes some soil),Typology: rounded midrib transforms into lozengic close to tip; slight but very broad edge bevesl echoing "ivy-leaf" blade shape; loop plates low, flat, and lenticular; socket m. has strong ext. chamfer - curved in profile.,Manufacture: Extant patina carries grmks along e. bevels to blade generally across socket side below blade, and in lozenge shape encircling loop position; Perfn. through socket wall beneath at least one loop,Condition: very minor corrosion damage to otherwise very sharp edges; small dent in m/rib where it meets blade.,Attached Material: Soil still in socket end and in loops. Small fragment of ?fibre (?thong) emanating from one loop - minerally replaced.
pageContext.surface: Small areas of very dark green patina - also very thin; mostly flaked to dry green or greeny-brown surface.
